allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: split OnlineStatsChains.jl into modular components

Split the large monolithic file into smaller, focused modules:
- types.jl: Core data structures (CycleError, Node, Edge, StatDAG)
- dag_algorithms.jl: Graph algorithms (cycle detection, topological sort)
- propagation.jl: Value propagation and recomputation logic
- fit.jl: Fit operations for single and multiple nodes
- utilities.jl: Public API utilities and helper functions

This improves code maintainability and makes the codebase easier to navigate.
